actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the General Bridge Act of 1946, as amended to eliminate the requirements of review and approval of the location and plans for bridges and causeways over certain navigable waters of the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the General Bridge Act of 1946 to eliminate the requirements for review and approval of the location and plans for bridges and causeways over navigable waters which are not subject to the ebb and flow of the tide and which are not used and are not susceptible to use in their natural condition or by reasonable improvement as a means to transport interstate or foreign commerce.

titles.title: A bill to amend the General Bridge Act of 1946, as amended to eliminate the requirements of review and approval of the location and plans for bridges and causeways over certain navigable waters of the United States, and for other purposes.
